meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of hymenopterans.
meanings.sent1: The tiny hymenopteran wings fluttered gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the hymenopteran behavior in great detail.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was interrupted by a curious hymenopteran guest who wanted to join in the fun.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as busy as a hive of hymenopteran activity.
meanings.sent5: The garden was alive with the hum of hymenopteran activity.

meanings.sent1: The children watched in awe as the hymenopteran buzzed around the flowers.
meanings.sent2: The farmer relied on hymenopterans to pollinate his crops.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy hymenopteran bumped into the window, trying to find its way out.
meanings.sent4: The field was a bustling metropolis for the tiny hymenopteran inhabitants.
meanings.sent5: The intricate nest-building skills of hymenopterans never ceased to amaze the observers.
